content: HDI-L+ Drop-in anchor High-performance tool-set drop in anchor ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Flared end provides flush installation, consistent anchor depth, and easy rod alignment Anchor, setting tool and Hilti drill bit form a matched tolerance system to provide more reliable fastening Step plug design reduces number of hammer blows up to 50% Easy-to-read brand and size identification Applications Suspended ceilings Pipe fixing Cable trays Scaffolding Temporary applications in solid concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: Environmental conditions: Dry indoor Approvals / Test reports: FM (Factory Mutual), UL (Underwriter Laboratories) Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Technical Data | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor | Approvals / Test reports | FM (Factory Mutual), UL (Underwriter Laboratories) | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Base materials | Concrete (lightweight), Concrete (lightweight over metal deck), Concrete (uncracked) | PROFIS Software | No ### ITEMS- 409495 -
